originalText.text: BEWARE! Avoid this dishonest company. I ordered a specific leather and color. In August. The company screwed up by discontinuing the leather and color 2 days before they accepted my order on their website and confirmed they were processing my order. Then, without ever notifying me, they shipped a different leather and color after 2 month delay and initially resisted taking the wrong chair back. Lisa was very friendly and responsive.  The rest of Humanscale stinks.  They don't care about charging over $1700 for a custom chair and changing the textile and color without telling you.  Dishonest and unresponsive. DO NOT USE!

originalText.text: Their chair is alright but i think they intentionally don’t provide much adjustability as a feature. Which means if you are too short ,too tall or too big their chair won’t work for you. I had to return a chair because i could fit only half my bottom in. The customer service is not bad… but just slow. On top of that what company website doesn’t allow you to view your own orders?

originalText.text:
I would not recommend this company at all. We were in the midst of renovating our NYC apartment and our architect called them and asked them to recommend a keyboard drawer for an 18 inch depth desk.

We purchased the one they recommended and several months later, when the desk was built, we realized that this keyboard drawer was designed for a 24 inch depth desk. It was brand new unused and they refused to allow us to return it for credit (we were willing to pay the restocking fee) as the purchase had exceeded their 45 day return limitation.

Very poor business practice and they fail to even make good on their own mistaken recommendation.

We purchased the one they recommended and several months later, when the desk was built, we realized that this keyboard drawer was designed for a 24 inch depth desk. It was brand new unused and they refused to allow us to return it for credit (we were willing to pay the restocking fee) as the purchase had exceeded their 45 day return limitation.

Very poor business practice and they fail to even make good on their own mistaken recommendation.

originalText.text: I ordered a several products online from Humanscale on December 16, 2017, but as of February 6, 2018, I have not received an order acknowledgement, the items have not shipped, and I have not received a shipping date. After 7 support interactions with various Humanscale representatives over the past couple months, the items I paid for still have not been shipped, and they have been unwilling to refund the charges. Humanscale representatives have not once returned my calls or emails with any updates as they promised they would do, and they keep repeatedly losing my order information. Based on my experiences, I would strongly warn against doing any business with Humanscale.

originalText.text: APPOINTMENT REQUIRED FOR ENTRY.  Totally unhelpful if you show up without one.  Happy to give my money to a competitor
